IOTA Wallet: Your Gateway to the IOTA Rebased testnet

Unleash the potential of IOTA Rebased with our open-source self custody Wallet. Effortlessly manage assets and engage with decentralized applications (dApps) on the IOTA Rebased testnet.

Highlighted Features:

• dApp Interaction: Securely connect to dApps, approve transactions with full transparency, and manage permissions easily.
• Comprehensive Asset Management: View and transfer your assets directly within the IOTA ecosystem.
• Account Management: Safely create or import accounts using mnemonics, private keys and seeds.
• Activity Overview: Stay on top of your wallet activities and access detailed transaction information via the IOTA Explorer.
• Enhanced Security Through Ledger Hardware Support: Boost your security with Ledger hardware integration for added protection.
